sent.orig: The centimeter is the fundamentalunit of length in the centimeter-gram-second system.
sent.trans: 米在C.G.S.公制中为一种长度的基本单位。

sent.orig: The centimeter-gram-second unit of magnetic induction, equal to one maxwell per square centimeter.
sent.trans: 高斯电磁感应的厘米-克-秒单位，等于每平方厘米的麦克斯韦尔。

sent.orig: A centimeter-gram-second unit of dynamic viscosity equal to one dyne-second per square centimeter.
sent.trans: 泊流体动力黏度的厘-克-秒单位，等于每平方厘米达因-秒。

sent.orig: A unit equal to one gram calorie per square centimeter of irradiated surface measure solar radiation.
sent.trans: 吸收辐射剂量单位等于每克辐射材料尔格。

sent.orig: The centimeter-gram-second electromagnetic unit of inductance, equal to one billionth of a henry.
sent.trans: 厘米-克-秒制中感应系数的电磁单位，相当于一亨利的十亿分之一。
